channel.title: 2 steps
channel.description:
My friend has a 317 server, and when i get on it with my mac, I can only take 2 steps before it chrashes!
HELP ME

item.title: 2 steps
item.dc:creator: @The_Eternity The Eternity
item.description:
@The_Eternity wrote:

aaronmead:

Yet then why are you in the Help section when you didn’t help him?

I’m that friend with the server. We talk on a private server’s forum. He thought he’d get some decent help here but I guess the MoparScape community did it’s job again. He gave a link to this thread, with the text “And look at THIS BS”, and what do you know? He’s right.

aaronmead:

Dan, I think your computer’s crap. Or there’s some errors in the .jar file, if you can provide link of where you got it from, i might be able to look at it

The jar is fine; It runs smoothly on Windows and Mac - tested - just not his Mac. And the jar is obfuscated.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 steps
item.dc:creator: @aaronmead aaronmead
item.description:
@aaronmead wrote:

This is the exact reason why I never come back to MoparScape. You call this helping a player? What the hell are you even doing in the help section when you're planning on making replies such as this? Grow the fuck up you immature waste of brain

Yet then why are you in the Help section when you didn’t help him?
Dan, I think your computer’s crap. Or there’s some errors in the .jar file, if you can provide link of where you got it from, i might be able to look at it

Read full topic

item.title: 2 steps
item.dc:creator: @The_Eternity The Eternity
item.description:
@The_Eternity wrote:

[quote=“why so serious, post:11, topic:377174”]Sever is prob. Fucked up.
Try other servers.[/quote]
Server is probably fucked up? It’s a Hyperion server. Besides, if it would be a software error, other operating systems would’ve experienced the same thing. It is only on his Mac though.

Read full topic

item.description:

Ah no, there is no help here. little -peep’s-.

Its probly because your java? ( I dont got a mac, so cant check that out )
But anyways i think you need to download the latest version of java. Since version 6 is long out dated

item.title: 2 steps
item.dc:creator: @The_Eternity The Eternity
item.description:
@The_Eternity wrote:

krackkid:

Get a windows computer, Then you will be fine.

This is the exact reason why I never come back to MoparScape. You call this helping a player? What the hell are you even doing in the help section when you’re planning on making replies such as this? Grow the fuck up you immature waste of brain.

Dan, I advice you not to come back here as these forums simply do not contain any people with decent sense. I’ll give you a link to a better RSPS community later on.

And I might be banned or whatever on these forums when a moderator views this, but to be honest I really don’t care. I’m not planning on coming back here anyway.

Goodbye
Mike.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 steps

item.description:
@Squishy410 wrote:

Yes, my friend has a 317 client that I can download. I download it, and it is just a runable .jar file. It connects, and I can log in and talk to him. But after 2 steps, it freezes and crashes.

I am running on Java SE 6 64bit.
